content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
This structure involves the insertion of coal and iron ore into the stone furnaces for processing. The agent has set up a system to manage the input of resources into the furnaces.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have enough capacity to accept the items being inserted before attempting to insert.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnaces have produced the items to avoid unnecessary extraction attempts.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check the inventory to ensure that there is enough space before harvesting or extracting items.
